Kj8cBEhX3QY9uk3Z.name: Legend Lore
Kj8cBEhX3QY9uk3Z.description:
You learn significant information about the target. This could range from the most up-todate research, lore forgotten in old tales, or even previously unknown information. The spell gives you additional, more detailed information if you already have some knowledge of the target. The spell will not return any information for items not of legendary renown.

The knowledge you gain is always true, but may be obscured by metaphor, poetic language, or verse.

If you use the spell for a cursed tome, for instance, you may gain knowledge of the dire words spoken by its creator as they brought it into the world.

Cast at Higher Levels. Your intuition surrounding the target is enhanced and you gain advantage on one Investigation check regarding it for each slot level above 6th.

system.description:
Having spent time with both your arcane studies and the artifact you possess, you have achieved a varied and unique connection to magic. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence, or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.24rmiwo0w5pd746x]{Legend Lore} once per long rest without using a spell slot. You must still supply the books, but can ignore the other material components.
  • The number of magic items you can attune to increases by 1. It increases by 1 again when your combined wielder + wizard levels equal 15.
  • Half your wizard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.58m3opb9e064kx2g]{Artifact Incarnate} feature.
